name: 0 - The Fool
uprightMeaning: beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit

name: II - The High Priestess
uprightMeaning: intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind
reversedMeaning: secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal and silence

name: III - The Empress
uprightMeaning: Upright: femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance
reversedMeaning: Reversed: creative block, dependence on others

name: IV - The Emperor
uprightMeaning: authority, father figure, structure, solid foundation

name: V - The Hierophant
uprightMeaning: religion, group identity, conformity, tradition, beliefs

name: I - Ace of Wands
uprightMeaning: Upright: inspiration, power, creation, beginnings, potential
reversedMeaning: Reversed: delays, lack of motivation, weighed down

name: I - Ace of Swords
uprightMeaning: Upright: raw power, victory, breakthroughs, mental clarity
reversedMeaning: Reversed: confusion, chaos, lack of clarity

name: I - Ace of Cups
uprightMeaning: Upright: love, new relationships, compassion, creativity

name: I - Ace of Pentacles
uprightMeaning: Upright: a new financial or career opportunity, manifestation, abundance
reversedMeaning: Reversed: lost opportunity, lack of planning and foresight
